availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas J. Keeny (Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer )

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Thomas Keeny. Married to Jane Keeny. Father of Julia Ann Keeny and Martha Keeny. Farmer in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1860. Employed William Ren and Edward Ring as farm laborers in Caldwell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 360B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Long Pond, p. 10.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #6228.
